mapper.select: select count(*) from ope_customer_inquiry a left join ope_car_distribute_node b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id left join ope_customer c on a.customer_id = c.id where a.dr = 0 and c.dr = 0 and c.status = 2 and (b.flag = 1 or b.flag is null)

select a.customer_id, IFNULL(a.full_name, c.company_name) as fullName, a.email, a.scooter_quantity, a.updated_time as generateDate, b.node from ope_customer_inquiry a left join ope_car_distribute_node b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id left join ope_customer c on a.customer_id = c.id where a.dr = 0 and c.dr = 0 and c.status = 2 and (b.flag = 1 or b.flag is null)
order by a.updated_time desc limit #{param.startRow}, #{param.pageSize}
